title: ToneTeller
description: A Python sentiment analysis tool that uses NLTK and the VADER sentiment model to evaluate emotional tones within text/journaling entries, applying polarity scoring, regex-based sentence parsing, and corpus stopword filtering to extract and display meaningful patterns.

title: Project Portfolio
description: A project showcase website built using Python, and created and deployed using Streamlit. This web app displays projects utilizing CSV file data processing, and it has a feature that allows any user to send me an email through the Contact Me webpage.

title: Word for Word
description: An interactive quote-guessing web app built using Python, and created and deployed using Streamlit. This project utilizes web scraping, and it works in connection with an external SQL database using SQLite.

title: To-Do List
description: A desktop GUI project built using Python, which allows user to add and complete tasks throughout the day. This helps the user with organization and keeping track of to-do's.

title: Above & Beyond
description: A web app built using Python, and created and deployed using Streamlit. It serves the purpose of providing weather forecasting data and daily astronomy info, utilizing multiple REST APIs to fetch this data based on location/days selected by user.

title: Healthy Habit Helper
description: A C++ terminal-based program to help user keep track of healthy habits to maintain and encourage a healthy lifestyle. It also serves to improve mental health through helpful tips and positive messaging.

title: Dungeon Escape
description: A C++ terminal-based game that descriptively takes the user on a dungeon adventure full of dangers and challenges. The user must overcome various challenges in order to survive and escape the dungeon.
